item.title: Report X-2024051286
item.description:
Report X-2024051286

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-05T15:12:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-15
  • City: ELMSFORD
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: HAZMAT PACKAGE LEFT NEAR DMP AREA TO BE PROCESSED, RESPONDER NOTICED WET SPOT ON CORNER OF PACKAGE, NO OTHER DAMAGE SEEN ON OUTSIDE PACKAGING. RESPONDER OPENED AND SAW ONE CONTAINER HAD LEAK AND RESIDUE AND ALSO LOOSE CAP WITH BROKEN SEAL. OTHER 3 CONTAINERS HAD NO RESIDUE OR LEAKAGE, BUT CAPS WERE LOOSE. RESPONDER REMOVED LEAKING CONTAINER TO PROCESS THROUGH DMP. OTHER 3 CONTAINERS TO BE RETURNED TO SHIPPER WITH SALVAGE DRUM.
